* Biomass smiles to himself; so this bot had an attetude after all. Perfect. 
This was a very important discovery, one that he logged away into his data 
banks.
Nue'e looked edgy as she stood behind Perndabot, giving Biomass the look. 
This could get ugly, and they were here to discover, not beat the crap out 
of them.
She reached up with a careful hand and moved to give a little tug on one of 
Perndabot's fingers to get his attention.*

" Um...excuse me?"

* Her voice was small, like her nature. She was very timmid and this was a 
big step for her.*

"Don't mind him. He's always trying to show off infront of the ladies."

* Her optics motioned from Perndabot to Swift, even though she was lying
through her teeth. Biomass was doing this to see the personality of
Perndabot so he could have something interesting to report.
She gives Biomass that look again, telling him to just go along with it.
Biomass doesn't even aknowledge the look.*

" We'll see him now if he's not busy. Take us to him." he said, pushing his 
luck even further. He glances when he sees a movement in the corner of his 
eye, noticing the autogun move towards them, looking back towards Perndabot 
with an expression that said that he had seen the weapon and who it was
aiming at.
But Biomass also had a single sentance written in his expression as well, 
his optics locked with Perndabots. " Bring it on." And his look spoke true.*
